content.rendered:
The Clay Cleanser with Sandalwood is a luxurious non-foaming gentle cream cleanser that sinks into the skin to remove all make up and impurities, leaving it nourished and softened, without disrupting the pH balance of the skin.

This soothing blend of jojoba, macadamia and almond oils, with activated white clay and cooling sandalwood, gently purifies and re-mineralises as it cleanses, without drying or dehydrating the skin.

With a delicate aroma and a beautiful texture, it is as soothing for the senses as it is for the skin.

excerpt.rendered: A luxurious non-foaming cream cleanser that gently removes make-up and impurities, while softening and soothing irritated or sensitive skin.
